Environmental Fluid Mechanics Lab

at UKZN

The Environmental Fluid Mechanics Lab at UKZN
Computational fluid dynamics Estuary hydrodynamics (e.g. St. Lucia Estuary) Coastal water quality monitoring and pollution dispersion modeling Coastal Engineering: wind, waves and cross-current modeling, sediment transport
